Test Steps: 1) Enter valid ID in the "Customer ID" field
Expected Result: Manger moved to the next field successfully without error message

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field
1) Do not enter a value in "Customer ID" field
Expected Result: An error message "Customer ID is required" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to next field

Test Cases: Customer ID can't contains special characters
Test Steps: 1) Enter any special characters the "Customer ID" field
Expected Result: An error message "Special characters are not allowed" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field
1) Enter any characters the "Customer ID" field
Expected Result: An error message "Characters are not allowed" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field

Test Cases: Customer ID first character can't have space
Test Steps: 1) Enter space in the first character of the "Customer ID" field
Expected Result: An error message "First character can not have space" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field

Test Cases: Manager can delete customer after entering valid "Customer ID"
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Customer ID" associated with the manager
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the manager
Expected Result: The manager successfully delete the customer

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Manager successfully redirected to the customer data after entering valid Customer ID
Test Steps: 1) Enter any "Customer ID"
Test Data: Accounts No. not associated to the manager
Expected Result: An error message "You are not authorize to delete this customer!!" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Manager can't delete account if "Customer ID" field is empty
Test Steps: 1) Leave the "Customer ID" field empty
Expected Result: An error message "Please fill all fields" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Manger can reset the Customer ID field
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Customer ID" associated with the manager
Expected Result: All the data entered must be deleted

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Reset" button

Test Cases: Nothing happen when clicking on reset button without entering any data
Test Steps: 1) Leave the "Customer ID" field empty
2) Click on the "Reset" button

Test Cases: Manager can't delete customer account not associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Customer ID" not associated with the manager
Expected Result: An error message "Invalid Account No" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Manager can delete an inactive customer current or saving account associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid inactive current or saving "Customer ID" account associated with the manager
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the manager
Expected Result: An error message "Invalid Account No" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Submit" button
